name: Very poorly designed ship
description:
Gameplay

This is not your traditionnal shoot'em up, as your ship has been deisgned to break down very quickly.

Each time you activate an ability (shield, laser, propulsors) the corresponding machines will start to break. Fortunatly you have a wonderful crew of one engineer and one scientist, who can repair your ship, but  beware ! while being repaired the ability is unaivalable.

You'll have to manage them while navigating your ship through the hostile outer space.

Control
  •  Left click: select worker
  •  Right click: move worker to location
  •  Left click on switches to toggle the ship abilities (shield, laser, propulsors)
  •  Escape: toggle pause menu
